mapper.select: select count(*) from NOTICE

select NOTICE_NUM as "num", ADMIN_ID as "id", NOTICE_TYPE as "type", NOTICE_SUBJECT as "subject", NOTICE_CONTENT as "content", NOTICE_DATE as "date", NOTICE_READCOUNT as "readcount", NOTICE_IMAGE as "image" from NOTICE where NOTICE_NUM = #{num}
select count(*) from FAQ
select FAQ_NUM as "num", ADMIN_ID as "id", FAQ_SUBJECT as "subject", FAQ_CONTENT as "content" from FAQ where FAQ_NUM = #{num}
mapper.delete: delete from WISH WHERE MEM_ID = #{id} AND LES_NUM = #{num}
mapper.insert: insert into QNA(MEM_ID, QNA_SUBJECT, QNA_QUESTION, QNA_UPDATE) values(#{name}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{update})
insert into LESSON_QNA(MEM_ID, LES_NUM, LQNA_SUBJECT, LQNA_QUESTION, LQNA_UPDATE) values(#{name}, #{num}, #{subject}, #{question}, #{update})
insert into REVIEW(MEM_ID, LES_NUM, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_UPDATE, REVIEW_IMAGE, REVIEW_RATING) values(#{id}, #{num}, #{content}, #{update}, #{preview}, #{rating})
mapper.select: SELECT LES_SUBJECT as "subject", LES_PREVIEW as "preview", LES_CATEGORY as "category", LES_SUBCATEGORY as "subCategory", LES_PRICE as "price", LES_LOCATION as "location" from LESSON where LES_NUM IN (SELECT LES_NUM from WISH WHERE MEM_ID = #{id}) order by LES_NUM desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

SELECT l.LES_SUBJECT as "subject", r.REVIEW_NUM as "num", r.REVIEW_CONTENT as "content", r.REVIEW_UPDATE as "update", r.REVIEW_RATING as "rating" FROM REVIEW r JOIN LESSON l on l.LES_NUM = r.LES_NUM WHERE r.LES_NUM in (select LES_NUM FROM LESSON WHERE MEM_ID = #{id}) order by REVIEW_NUM desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
select count(*) from REVIEW where LES_NUM IN (SELECT LES_NUM FROM LESSON WHERE MEM_ID = #{id})

select LQNA_QUESTION as "question", LQNA_ANSWER as "answer", LQNA_SUBJECT as "subject", LQNA_NUM as "num" from LESSON_QNA where LES_NUM IN (SELECT LES_NUM FROM LESSON WHERE MEM_ID = #{id}) order by LQNA_NUM desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
select count(*) from LESSON_QNA where LES_NUM IN (SELECT LES_NUM FROM LESSON WHERE MEM_ID = #{id})
select count(*) from REVIEW where LES_NUM IN (SELECT LES_NUM FROM LESSON WHERE MEM_ID = #{id})
